title: TechTalk
overview: Discover flying taxis, robots for the elderly, firefighting drones, 3D holographic surgery & much more! Explore a world of technology & innovation that you never dreamed existed! Multiple Award-Winning Series TechTalk, takes you to see the hottest start-ups & upcoming entrepreneurs from across the globe. Checkout 50+ wow-factor new technologies that are transforming our planet for the better.
